local_intent: Confirm cloth visibility and tool yaw, execute a straight push along the cloth edge, then briefly stabilize.
assumptions: Tool is already near the edge with gentle contact established
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: verifies target visibility and yaw (90 deg), performs the push of 0.1m at 180 deg, then waits briefly, aligning with the global sequence after contact and before retreat.
